text: Anyone else having issues with the design manager yesterday/today? This error intermittantly shows up, if i refresh the screen and then copy and paste all my code back into the editor it goes away (no changes between copy and paste)... Thoughts? Seems like it might be abug
Will have some :eyes: on this once first thing today
DM me if you need a link
Anyone having issues copying templates to portals? If I click “do not copy” on a few associated dependencies, then nothing gets copied over.
Yea I’ve consistently had that issue from the beginning in DM2. I’ve just been copying everything over and deleting what i dont need
hi John! I can take a look at your issue. can you please DM me your portal id and what you are trying to copy?
hi Jon! sorry to hear you've have issues with copying to portals. can you DM me the issue you've been seeing consistently?
